quickfly.title: Quick Fly
quickfly.name: Name
quickfly.info: The position of the new saved location is captured automatically from the current region shown on the map.

clicks_enabled: Clicking on operations and restricted flight volumes will show their properties. Click here to change this behaviour
clicks_disabled: Clicking on operations and restricted flight volumes will NOT show their properties. Click here to change this behaviour

volume.nearstructure: Is this operation volume within 400' of a structure?
volume.bvlos: Describes whether any portion of the operation volume is beyond the visual line of sight of the RPIC.

operation.send_email_to: Send an email contaning a report of this operation, for auditing purposes, to the following email

editor.completesteps: Complete the steps to define a new operation.
editor.definevolume: Click on the map to define a polygon.
editor.savingerror: Please change the affected parameters and retry.
editor.cant_finish: The OPERATION could not be created, as the polygon was not defined. Please, define a polygon for where the vehicle can fly, by clicking on the map on the appropiate positions

expired_permit.title: Your permit has expired!
expired_permit.text: When you submit your operation, it will not be approved automatically. You will have to await the manual approval by an administrator of the system

no_uas_selected: No vehicle has been selected to fly the operation. Please select AT LEAST ONE and then try again
no_polygon_drawn: Operations MUST have an associated Polygon. Please draw it in the map by clicking on it, and then try again
following_drone: You are now following a vehicle that is in the air. The map has been locked, and you won't be able to drag it. You can still zoom in or zoom out. You may stop following a drone by pressing the CROSS on the SideMenu
